title: My phone (Pixel 2 XL) won't charge
content:
My phone's battery has been draining extremely quickly (down to 15% within 4 hours)  and has been charging extremely slowly. Even when I turn it off, it barely charges. The outlet and cord both work, and I have tried others, so that's not the issue. I have also tried all the recommended fixes including a factory reset and there has been no improvement. 
I still have $500 left to pay off on this phone and can't afford another, is there any way to fix this?
